---- markdown ----
# This is my post

The first paragraph, which is long,
says this in two lines.

The second paragraph has *emphasized text* and **bold text** in it.

The third paragraph has a **single element** in it.

## First section, which is empty

## Second section

Some text comes here.
---- gplus ----
*This is my post*

The first paragraph, which is long, says this in two lines.

The second paragraph has _emphasized text_ and *bold text* in it.

The third paragraph has a *single element* in it.

*First section, which is empty*

*Second section*

Some text comes here.
